issue.title: [Docs][Release] Update post release script to move stable docs to versioned + keep dev docs
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-15601](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-15601). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
xref https://github.com/apache/arrow-site/pull/187

We need to update the `post-09-docs.sh` script to keep the dev docs and to move the current stable docs to a versioned sub-directory

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-15601?focusedCommentId=17518529) by Kouhei Sutou (kou):*
Issue resolved by pull request 12355
